엉킨 추억의 복도 1079

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(It's because they fight when you knock off from work...) </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Guard Citridel$
Haha I'm fine! I'm all good! Oh by the way, {user_nick}! Thank you bringing me the herb last time!
I felt much better after sleeping for a while. The Elder and the King aren't fighting with each other anymore too!

$Elf Guard Citridel$
The Elder said I should tell him anytime if I didn't feel well, but…

$Elf Guard Citridel$
I think I forgot what if feels like to feel well.
Isn't it normal to dose off during the day or suddenly fall on the floor unconscious?

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Well, actually I haven't been seriously unwell either. I feel weak these days though, so I'm trying to concentrate on something interesting to give me energy! That's why I borrowed this book. Tada!(Citridel shows you a book titled "The History of Lunascent")

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Oh? {user_nick}, so you know about Lunascent too! This kingdom was amazing. It had a fascinating culture that was both delicate and grand at the same time! Phew, I heard that this country has declined now but my heart still pounds when I read stories about Lunascent. It makes me feel that humans are incredible too...

$Elf Guard Citridel$
I keep reading their famous advancements in the medical field nowadays haha.

$Elf Guard Citridel$
So... I know I shouldn't bother you too much but...! {user_nick}, you can enter the Forest of Little Shadows so... I was wondering by any chance if you would be going to a place called the Corridor of Tangled Memories.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The name sounds weird but... Oh well, I'll get it for you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Guard Citridel$
I heard that a moss there is especially good for my symptoms... Can you get me some? It's called [Gastricowwmoss]! It's so good that the monsters there secretly hide some in their loincloths.
<html>$Tale of Lunascent$</html>

$Elf Guard Citridel$
It's at the Corridor of Tangled Memories and you can get there via Forest of Little Shadows! Thank you so much!
(Citridel waves her hand enthusiastically. Though the name of the herb sounds suspicious, go and get some for Citridel)

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Ah, {user_nick}…
(Citridel looks like she has no strength)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, maybe you should take another medicine… </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Guard Citridel$
I found out that... The moss has to be cleaned and dried in a cool place away from direct sunlight for 100 days... Ah, 100 days is too long... My stomach will... Oww my stomach...

$Elf Guard Citridel$
I thought this was my chance to get rid of this sickening gastric pain once and for all...
{user_nick}, you must have went through much trouble to get this for me too...

$Elf Guard Citridel$
I need to do something to repay your kindness... Oh! If you're interested in Lunascent, maybe I can tell you about what I've read! It's about the royal family. Are you interested?

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Lunascent was a vast powerful country in the east. The book says that it flourished for about 2000 years. They were the ones who managed to become the most powerful after the fall of the Ancients.

$Elf Guard Citridel$
According to the legends, the royal family that founded the kingdom had special powers. But they made sure the secret about those powers was controlled tightly and no one knew how they managed to get them. Some even say that what they were hiding was the Goddess, but the authors of all the books I read were skeptical about that rumour.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Just how fierce were the internal strifes for that many people to die?!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Guard Citridel$
They said, if the royal family was protected by the Goddess, they wouldn't have fallen to Feder. Besides, the internal strife within the royal family was so fierce that the number of people who died due to internal fighting added up to be about a quarter of the number of people who had gone missing in the Ancients' days.

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Moreover, they suffered from countless natural disasters even before they were conquered by Feder. It was as if nature was telling them the days of their kingdom was over, so the people in Lunascent thought it was because the heaven was displeased with the royal family.

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Most of the members of the royal family were good looking and strong, but I guess good looks doesn't translate to good governance. At the end of its days, the kingdom suffered from tyranny as well... Even when the people were starving from famine, the royal family held lavish feasts.

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Even right before the country fell to Feder, half of the palace was filled with blood, and the other half was filled with laughter from parties...
Phew, the smell of blood would have stopped any party for sane people. I really don't like this aspect about humans...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(That must have been a shock to an Elf like Citridel...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Guard Citridel$
Though the palace was quite huge, it gives me goosebumps to think that they didn't feel anything for their kin who were dying in the other side of the palace...

$Elf Guard Citridel$
But what's more amazing is that even after their kingdom fell, the people of Lunascent continued their culture and traditions!
They hate Saint Haven so they can usually be found in the Fragrance Palace which is the old capital city of Lunascent. I'll take a visit on my next vacation.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Not all of them must have been bad.</html>
<html>Get armed from head to toe before you go, Citridel.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Guard Citridel$
I heard those who used to work quite closely with the royal family are still there!
I hope they're not scary... The royal family sure was!
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Erm, but since we're on emergency now, I don't think I can go there in the near future. That's sad...
I hope the world doesn't end before I visit Lunascent...
(That's a rather carefree worry)

journal.title: Tale of Lunascent 1
journal.contents:
Go to Corridor of Tangled Memories to find another herb for Citridel.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Corridor of Tangled Memories
journal.destination: Kill monsters at the Corridor of Tangled Memories
journal.todo_msg: Kill monsters at the Corridor of Tangled Memories and get the herb.

journal.title: Tale of Lunascent 2
journal.contents:
You've found the moss. Take it to Citridel.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Elf Guard Citridel
